option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24"> <path android:fillColor="#2196F3" android:pathData="M9.29,6.71a1,1 0 0,0 0,1.41L13.17,12l-3.88,3.88a1,1 0 1,0 1.41,1.41l4.59,-4.59a1,1 0 0,0 0,-1.41l-4.59,-4.59a1,1 0 0,0 -1.41,0z"/> </vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24"> <path android:fillColor="#2196F3" android:pathData="M9.29,6.71a1,1 0 0,0 0,1.41L13.17,12l-3.88,3.88a1,1 0 1,0 1.41,1.41l4.59,-4.59a1,1 0 0,0 0,-1.41l-4.59,-4.59a1,1 0 0,0 -1.41,0z"/> </vector>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivAvatarEdit" android:layout_width="96dp" android:layout_height="96dp" android:src="@drawable/user" android:contentDescription="@string/profile_avatar" android:layout_gravity="center" />
<!-- Added editable name and email fields --> <EditText android:id="@+id/etFullName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/full_name_hint" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:autofillHints="name" android:importantForAutofill="yes" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/email_hint" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:autofillHints="emailAddress" android:importantForAutofill="yes" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etPassword" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="@string/password_label" android:inputType="textPassword" android:autofillHints="password" android:importantForAutofill="yes" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:maxWidth="600dp" android:minWidth="240dp" android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/ivTogglePassword" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_visibility_off_24dp" android:contentDescription="@string/toggle_password" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_gravity="end" android:minHeight="48dp" android:minWidth="48dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSave" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btn_save" android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingLeft="16dp" android:paddingRight="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/btn_back" android:minHeight="48dp" android:paddingLeft="16dp" android:paddingRight="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:layout_gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnBack" android:layout_width="48dp" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:src="@drawable/ic_chevron_left_24dp" android:contentDescription="Quay lại" app:tint="@color/gray_900" android:padding="12dp" /> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chỉnh sửa hồ sơ" android:textStyle="bold" android:textSize="18sp" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" /> </LinearLayout>
<EditText android:id="@+id/etFullName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Họ và tên" android:inputType="textPersonName" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_person" android:drawablePadding="12dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etEmail" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Email" android:inputType="textEmailAddress" android:enabled="false" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_email" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etBirthDate" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Ngày sinh" android:focusable="false" android:clickable="true" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_calendar" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etPhone" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="Số điện thoại" android:inputType="phone" android:minHeight="48dp" android:padding="12dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_phone" android:drawablePadding="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" />
<Button android:id="@+id/btnSaveProfile" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Lưu" android:backgroundTint="@color/primary_blue" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" />
</LinearLayout>
